  1. Docs
  2. Projects

Projects¶

You can create and publish as many projects as you want on the spiderengine.io platform.

You can manage your project using the Cloud menu in the Editor.

Publish to spiderengine.io¶

Your creation will receive a unique URL and will be playable on the web.

Note

Upon publishing to web, your creation will be listed on the Projects Page.

Publish to a Private Web Server¶

You can publish to disk using the Editor and obtain the data necessary to host your creation on your server.

To do so, select Private Web Server from the Cloud menu in the editor.

Native Platforms¶

Support for PC, Mac, iOS and Android platforms is coming soon!
